channel.title: Mobile-App on Kenny Nguyen (momo)
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile-App on Kenny Nguyen (momo)

item.title: Review of Mobile App Pentesting Certifications
item.description: Review of Mobile App Pentest Certifications State of Mobile App Certs and My Journey The landscape of mobile app penetration testing certifications has been evolving rapidly. However, as a beginner to mobile app penetration testing, there isn’t as many resources compared to other domains of offensive security. At the moment, mobile app pentesting is still a niche domain in offsec and is not talked about much. Recently, I began getting into mobile app pentesting.
